org.sourceforge.autojar
Class Ajar

java.lang.Object
  org.sourceforge.autojar.Ajar

public class Ajar
extends java.lang.Object

Class providing a public interface (used by Autojar and Eclipse plugin).

Author:
Bernd Eggink (monoped@users.sourceforge.net)

Constructor Detail

Ajar

public Ajar(java.io.File outfile,
            java.util.List classPathList,
            java.util.List excludes,
            java.util.List filePathList,
            java.io.File manifest,
            int dynamic,
            boolean dynresource,
            boolean searchExtensions,
            boolean bothpaths,
            int level)
     throws java.io.IOException
Create an Ajar object.

Parameters:
outfile - Output file (jar).
classPathList - List containing user supplied class path components.
excludes - List containing class prefixes to exclude.
filePathList - List containing file path components.
manifest - File containing additional manifest entries.
dynamic - How to handle Class.ForName() etc. One of DYN_OFF, DYN_WARN, DYN_AUTO.
dynresource - If true, try to find and add dynamically loaded resources.
searchExtensions - If true, search extdirs for classes.
bothpaths - Use class path for file path.
level - Verbosity level. One of QUIET_LEVEL, STD_LEVEL, VERBOSE_LEVEL, DEBUG_LEVEL.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

Ajar

lookupClass

public boolean lookupClass(java.lang.String className)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Look up class in classpath.

Parameters:
className - class name in the form pack1.pack2.name. Name may contain wildcards.
Returns:
true if class found and not in excluded base, false otherwise
Throws:
java.io.IOException
